author: stahlleiton
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of [#43378](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43378) which creates a new era "Run3_UPC_2023" meant for the 2023 PbPb UPC re-reco.

#### PR validation:

Relval workflow 141.901 and private (documented in [slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1nK3r-i3EwV0YvkpJQb--lPLivD1NCmBTG-XZr__Xr0o/edit?usp=sharing))

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport from master (14_0_X) to 13_2_X
title: [13_2_X] Run3 era for 2023 PbPb UPC re-reco
